bike.description: All new A1 Premium Aluminum low center of gravity Enduro FSR frame, ORE technology DT and TT, forged HT, pierced seatube, sealed cartridge bearings, ISCG mount, two forward shock mounts for geometry adjustment, replaceable derailleur hanger, derailleur guard, 150mm travel
